page.title: 16HOUNSLOW'S MILITARY MUSIC
page.content: {Kneller Hall}is a military school of music. It was{built}in{1709,}and {opened}as a{music school}in{1856.}You need Grade 8 to go to Kneller Hall and the{training}takes{2 years}(or{3 years for{Assistant Bandmasters.)} There are {178}people learning at the moment, and {3}of the musicians are{female.}Some of the instruments played are drums, horns, trombones, saxophones, trumpets and lots more. There is a very good {museum}with instruments, pictures and facts, and there are about{12 concerts {a year}from May to August. Kneller Hall is being{closed down}soon because they are trying to{save money.}The soldiers, who are moving to Kent, and {many local people}are{upset,}because it means{no more concerts,}and Kneller Hall is home to the soldiers.
